definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: Generally speaking, termite-eaten wire poles ought to be replaced every two or three years.
sentences.chinese: 電杆被白蟻蛀蝕，一般兩三年就要換一次。

sentences.english: He backed a new car into the lamp-post in the street.
sentences.chinese: 他開着一輛新車向後倒，撞上了馬路上的電杆。

sentences.english: Erect and maintain steel, wood or concrete poles, towers and guy wires.
sentences.chinese: 樹立和維護鋼材，木材或混凝土電杆，塔和張索。
